update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for executing the binary, specified in seconds.

binary_path.ui:help: If an absolute path is provided, the collector will use it directly; otherwise, it will search for the binary in directories specified in the PATH environment variable.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
